name: hexjumper
text: Wow, Phillippe just can't get any love from his reflection.

name: idsyen
text: Surely we all know the mocking specter of suicide sought but not obtained. So close, yet so far...

name: saint
text: my reflection calls me a retard, too. it also calls me fat.

name: semiquaver
text: Does your icon say "Sylar?"  Because that looks nothing like Zachary Quinto.

name: i_love_kate
text: Except that... it is... him?

name: saint
text:
It doesn't?
Someone better let him know he's not looking like himself lately. You should do this.

name: rowboat
text:
Wow. I don't know what any of that means, but I always thought your avatar was of Taylor Hicks. Do I hate you more or less now.....

Hm. Gotta take stock.

name: soticoto
text: It is correct.

name: dubreign
text: anything dealing w/gravy has me sold!

name: mike24
text: phillipe is impatient

name: wae
text: Philippe is Five.

name: plummet
text: Actually, Philippe is a retard.

name: hoarday4
text: rude.

name: caseyb3
text:
Philippe is an otter. They're marine mammals; he could probably hold his breath all day and not die.

And that's not even getting into the stuffed animal thing.

OR DID I BLOW YOUR MIND

name: zefiel
text: Woah, crazy! I got the first Volume, so I don't check on these early strips too often, and this one Chris definitely revisited. In the book the Reflection doesn't say anything.

name: windex
text: I wonder if it was changed for the book, and not the other way around.

name: woodenteeth
text: Since when does Phillipe have such unconscious hate of himself... or that mirror is a portal to an "alternate" dimension... though evil Phillipe doesn't have a goatie.

name: tekende
text: He is only five.

name: semiquaver
text: Philippe held his breath long enough that he was hallucinating which is what the alt text is all about.

name: havenless
text: Phillipe just seems to have terrible psychosis.

name: nutmeg
text:
yeah man he's getting all Army of Darkness

taht whole scene should happen with Philippe instead of Bruce Campbell. imagine it.

name: philosophe
text: In panel 6, how is he talking while holding his breath. I know he never opens his mouth to talk. Is that ridiculous or what? Oh no wait, it's not ridiculous, it's Achewood.

name: talix18
text: WTF with the alt-text..."she could stand up freely inside the car; she was his wife; they are both gone now"?

name: woodenteeth
text: I don't get it either, I don't get it at all! Onstad is trying to FREAK US OUT!

name: zzzleepy
text: perplexing...

name: wozzeck
text: I am guessing that she was very short, and beautiful, probably a foreign girl who starved as a child behind Soviet barbed-wire. She escaped to America where a good man fell in love with her, but tragedy followed her, like a maniac amongst the Marielitos.

name: lux
text: Really. Is that what you guess. >_>

name: wozzeck
text: I don't know what ">_>" means. I don't know that language.

name: autrepoupee
text:
There was a wife here.
its gone now.

name: woodenteeth
text: Onstad, please. Explain the alt-text here... or someone else have a stab. Google wants nothing of it as a quote.

name: meepmeep
text: A comment left by meepmeep was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, Courtland, earendil, diplomat76, Wulvaine, Appers)

name: werewolves
text: I like the early alt texts. Less commentary on the strip, more bizarre disconnected sentences.

name: aaron_haynes
text: mexican magical realism mirror.

name: kikineko
text:
Mirror, Mirror on the wall,
Who's the most retarded person of them all?

*hint* Look at the mirror, Philippe.
